events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car with another vehicle at an intersection causing significant damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following the initial report of vehicle collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to manage and process the customer's auto accident claim promptly.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer of their support.
Requested accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and police report to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, accident photos, and repair estimate.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has officially begun by the claims department.
Investigation finished confirming liability and assessing damage to the insured vehicle after the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and other related expenses.
Customer provided positive feedback accepting the settlement offer and expressing satisfaction with the process.
The claim was formally approved and all terms of the settlement were confirmed with the customer.
The insurance payment for the approved claim was successfully issued to cover the vehicle repair costs.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following the completion of payment and customer confirmation.
All claim documentation and correspondences have been archived for future reference and record keeping.
